# hasznaltauto-watcher

Periodically scraper hasznaltauto.hu to find new listings, and sends a telegram message of those.

## Example config

The following `config.toml` file needs to mounted to `/data/config.toml`. The DB in the container by default lives in `/data/db.sqlite`. The easyest way is to mount a folder from your machine to `/data/` in the container, and place your `config.toml` in that.

```toml
db_path = "db.sqlite"
scan_interval_minutes = 10

telegram.bot_token = "<TELEGRAM BOT TOKEN>"
telegram.chat_id = 123 # <INSERT REAL TELEGRAM CHAT ID HERE>

search_urls = [
  # Toyota Prius
  "https://www.hasznaltauto.",
  # Opel Astra G
  "https://www.hasznaltauto.",
  # ALPINA
  "https://www.hasznaltauto.",
]
```
